title: help me pls
body: guys i have  a question someone changed my email in my account do u know any way i can change it back to my email

replies.body:
First, I recommend changing the password to the email address that was associated with your account. It's possible they may have used it to compromise your account, so you may also want to set up 2-step authentication, if possible. 

Next, you'll want to reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you to resolve this. Let me know if you have any questions.
